definition: marked by dark or relatively dark pigmentation of hair or skin or eyes, a person with dark (brown) hair
details:
adjective
- marked by dark or relatively dark pigmentation of hair or skin or eyes
= example: marked by dark or relatively dark pigmentation of hair or skin or eyes
= synonyms: brunet
noun
- a person with dark (brown) hair
= example: a person with dark (brown) hair
= synonyms: brunet
